name: The Backrooms: Operation Rescue
description:
The Backrooms: Operation Rescue

Welcome to the TaskForce. An elite unit dedicated to fighting against paranormal threats.  Their mission is to keep horrific entities, monsters and any humans who dare oppose them.  Employing a manner of high tech weapons and equipment, the TaskForce is equipped to deal with any sort of external threat.  But today might be their most dangerous mission yet.

Prelude

OpFor, the famed enemies of the TaskForce have taken hostages from the Knockers Strip Club for unknown reasons.  On a standard hostage rescue mission, an operative has mysteriously vanished from the site...

This game is still in development.  Please enjoy the Prelude Demo as we further develop the game.  Heavy feedback is greatly appreciated!

The demo was created in just three days.  Please be patient with any issues that may arise, and please report all bugs.
